1: To the Chanter, a Psalm of David. The LORD hear thee in the time of trouble, the name of the God of Jacob defend thee.
2: Send thee help from the Sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Sion.
3: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy brent sacrifice. Selah.
4: Grant thee thy heart's desire, and fulfil all thy mind.
5: We will rejoice in thy health, and triumph in the name of the LORD our God: the LORD performe all thy petitions.
6: Now know I, that the LORD helpeth his anointed, and will hear him from his holy heaven: mighty is the help of his right hand.
7: Some put their trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
8: They are brought down and fallen, but we are risen and stand(stonde) up right.
9: Save, LORD, and help us, O king, when we call upon thee.
